page.title: 02BALSAM'S FARM
page.content: Balsam's Farm is the biggest pig farm in Europe.It has about{2000}pigs.The fields rotate every two years because the pigs take protein from the fields and they give the soil a different protein.The farm is{237}acres and a {100}acres has pigs in.{137}acres has got peas in.The pig breeds are large white and saddleback.Ten years ago it was a stud farm and kept shire horses. There are two barns.The baby pigs are taken away at three weeks old and put into indoor units for fattening.They sell a{1000}pigs a week,some from other farms in the locality.The fencing is electric to keep the pigs in.Eighteen people are{employed}.The farm house was built in{1854}. { { {
